attributes.action: Take steps to investigate this travesty of Injustice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Steven Gater, a 25 year old man was viciously attacked and was left fighting for his life and frontal lobe damage.  The case against the assailants, was dropped, allegedly through lack of evidence.  There has been no contact from the Detective Inspector involved in the case and the majority of evidence in favour of Steven, was not gathered.  Something has to be done about this, to give Steven, his family and close friends  the faith in the judicial system.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
